pages.title: Proxima Centauri
pages.text: Once you have found enough Calorite to craft a tier four rocket, you will be able to leave this solar system and enter a new one. The first planet that you will head to in Proxima Centauri is Glacio. Glacio is brutally cold; however, it has oxygen, allowing you to survive there without a spacesuit.
This is the end of the Beyond Earth progression for now. This guidebook will be expanded as more content is added. Thanks for playing Beyond Earth!
